head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAO, DR. IVAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAO, DR. IVAN

block.p: CHAO-Dr. Ivan. Loving husband of Alice Chao. Father of Myrna S. Chao and Conklin Chao. Grandfather of Justy Chao DeWaal and Nyasia L. Chao DeWaal. Born in Shanghai, China. Died January 28, 2003 at age 93 in Brooklyn. Accomplished Professor of Philosophy and author. Ph.D. Harvard University. Member of underground resistance force against the Japanese occupation of Shanghai. Founder of Women's College in Shanghai. Taught at numerous universities including National Taiwan University, Zhang Zhe (National Political) University of Taiwan and University of New Mexico. Former President of Chinese American Culture Institute and Chairman, Overseas Chinese New Culture Association. A scholar and a gentleman. Graveside ceremony at Pinelawn Memorial Park, Farmingdale, 11AM, January 30th with a memorial banquet to follow later. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the Brooklyn Heights Montessori School (Dr. Ivan Chao Memorial Fund for China Studies) would be appreciated.
